Analyze the following text: A rack system comprising a plurality of chassis each having at least one node each of the nodes comprising at least one adjustable air vent and configured for adjusting the at least one adjustable air vent based on an air flow requirement of the node a plurality of fans wherein the plurality of fans are configured to operate based on a control signal and a fan control logic board wherein the fan control logic board is configured to receive from each node in the plurality of chassis the air flow requirements and based on the plurality of air flow requirements generate and transmit the control signal to the plurality of fans.

Analyze the following text: Method for operating a laundry treatment appliance 2 comprising a casing 36 within which a drum 6 rotated by a motor 68 is arranged an opening 28 provided in the casing 6 for loading the laundry into said drum 36 and a door 24 adapted to open or to close said opening 28 whereby said door 24 gives access to said drum 36 and is lockable by means of a door lock 58 and whereby said appliance 2 performs a laundry treatment cycle comprising the steps of a selecting a laundry treatment process b loading laundry into said drum 36 c starting said laundry treatment process d locking said door 24 by actuating said door lock 58 e estimating the amount of laundry load characterized in the steps of f issuing a notification if the amount of laundry lies outside a laundry load threshold range g if the amount of laundry lies outside said laundry load threshold range checking whether safetysecurity conditions for unlocking said door lock 58 are met if said conditions are met providing an unlocking enablement of said door lock 58 h maintaining said unlocking enablement of said door lock 58 for a prescribed waiting amount of time thereby allowing the user to change the amount of laundry load i determining if an interaction occurred which is linked to a possible access of laundry in said drum 36 j if said interaction did not occur prosecuting the laundry treatment process with one set of operational parameters k if said interaction has occurred performing step d and one of the followingprosecuting said laundry treatment process with said one set of operational parameters orprosecuting said laundry treatment process with another set of operational parameters different from said one set of operational parameters or l performing steps e to k up to a prescribed number of times.
Analyze the text for negations and identify their types.

Analyze the following text: A drive control system for a work machine comprising a work machine main body a front work implement 6 attached pivotably in an upward and downward direction with respect the work machine main body and having a plurality of movable parts a drive actuator 7 11 13 15 configured to drive each of the movable parts of the front work implement 6 a calculation device 60 configured to perform a control calculation for controlling driving of the drive actuator 7 11 13 15 an actuator drive hydraulic circuit 100A including a flow control valve configured to control supply of hydraulic fluid to the drive actuator 7 11 13 15 and a proportional pressure reducing valve 121 configured to output pilot hydraulic fluid to be supplied to the flow control valve based on an operation of a control lever 50 a lever operation amount detection unit configured to detect an operation amount of the control lever 50 and an attitude detection unit 49 configured to detect an attitude of the work machine wherein the calculation device 60 includes a stability judgment section 60d configured to predict based on the operation amount of the controllever 50 detected by the lever operation amount detection unit and the attitude of the work machine detected by the attitude detection unit 49 a behavior of the work machine when it is assumed that the work machine stops suddenly and judge stability of the work machine and an operation limitation determination section 60h configured to calculate and output a gradual stoppage command for limiting a deceleration of the drive actuator 7 11 13 15 based on a result of the judgment of the stability judgment section 60d to gradually stop the drive actuator 7 11 13 15 and an operation speed limitation command for limiting an upper limit operation speed of the drive actuator 7 11 13 15 the actuator drive hydraulic circuit 100A includes a pilot pressure correction unit 200 configured to correct a pilot pressure to be outputted from the proportional pressure reducing valve 121 in response to the gradual stoppage command and the operation speed limitation command from the operation limitation determination section 60h the pilot pressure correction unit 200 is configured from a stoppage characteristic modification unit 211 configured to correct the pilot pressure such that the drive actuator 7 11 13 15 is stopped gradually upon a stoppage operation of the control lever 50 and an operation speed limitation unit 241 configured to correct the pilot pressure such that the operation speed of the drive actuator 7 11 13 15 islimited the stoppage characteristic modification unit 211 and the operation speed limitation unit 241 are individually driven by the gradual stoppage command and the operation speed limitation command from the operation limitation determination section 60h such that when the gradual stoppage command and the operation speed limitation command are inputted from the operation limitation determination section 60h the pilot pressure to be outputted from the proportional pressure reducing valve 121 is corrected but when the gradual stoppage command and the operation speed limitation command are not inputted from the operation limitation determination section 60h the pilot pressure outputted from the proportional pressure reducing valve 121 is supplied to the flow control valve without being corrected the stoppage characteristic modification unit 211 includes a speed increasing unit 210 provided on a pilot line that connects the proportional pressure reducing valve 121 and the flow control valve the speed increasing unit 210 including a speed increasing solenoid proportional valve 221 222 connected to a pilot hydraulic fluid supply device other than the proportional pressure reducing valve 121 so as to generate and output a pressure higher than a pilot pressure outputted from the proportional pressure reducing valve 121 the operation speed limitation unit 241 includes a speed reducing unit 240 configured to reduce and outputthe pilot pressure the drive control system further includes a failure detection unit configured to detect a failure of the speed increasing solenoid proportional valve 221 222 included in the speed increasing unit 210 the actuator drive hydraulic circuit 100A further includes a speed increase interruption unit 330 configured to interrupt supply of the pilot hydraulic fluid from the pilot hydraulic fluid supply device other than the proportional pressure reducing valve 121 to the speed increasing unit 210 and the calculation device 60 causes when a failure of the speed increasing solenoid proportional valve 221 222 is detected by the failure detection unit the speed increase interruption unit 330 to interrupt supply of the pilot hydraulic fluid to the speed increasing unit 210.
